publications.title: A CX3CR1 Reporter hESC Line Facilitates Integrative Analysis of In-Vitro-Derived Microglia and Improved Microglia Identity upon Neuron-Glia Co-culture

genomic_modifications.description: Heterozygous insertion of a dual fluorescent/enzymatic reporter (tdTomato-T2A-NanoLuc) into one allele of CX3CR1 in the H9 hESC background.

genomic_characterisation.summary: Insertion confirmed by PCR and Southern blot; reported to be free of chromosomal aberrations by karyotyping.

ethics.institutional_HREC: Monash University Human Research Ethics Committee (MUHREC)
Monash University Human Research Ethics Committee (MUHREC)
